articles.description: Apple has started selling refurbished Studio Display models for a lower price in its United States online store.  Earlier in the year, Apple introduced the Studio Display, its first monitor since the 2019 Pro Display XDR.  The 5K LCD has a built-in microphone…
articles.content:
Apple Now Offering Refurbished Studio Display Models in the U.S.
